name: CarniGrow
description:
This game was created during Kenney Jam 2022 with the theme GROWTH. This was our first game jam entry ever. We both enjoyed it and are looking forward to next game jams.

Authors

Necro8 & FryMeALiver

Assets

All graphics comes from Kenney assets, as this was a rule of the game jam.

As for the audio, this is our own creation.

PLEASE LEAVE YOUR HIGH SCORE IN THE COMMENTS
